p: All cell culture materials and media were obtained from Gibco 速 (Invitrogen, Karlsruhe, Germany) and Greiner Labortechnik 速 (Frickenhausen, Germany). Chemicals and reference drugs were bought from Sigma 速 (Sternheim, Germany). The solvents with analytical grade were procured from Merck 速 (Darmstadt, Germany). All the tested microorganisms were provided by Medical Microbiology Lab., Hygiene Institute, Heidelberg University, Germany. Mycobacterium tuberculosis (RCMB 010126) strain was obtained from RCMB, Al-Azhar University, Cairo, Egypt and Helicobacter pylori ATCC 43504 strain from the American Type Culture Collection.
